column2: Shoreline surface clean for this time of year.
Some wind effect frequent showers yesterday.
Tree pollen light to heavy with only light breeze- very warm + humid.
Light overcast.  After several hours of rain + heaviest boat traffic of the year was very surprised on depths.  Readings reported to great American secchi dip-in.
No lake activity all day!  mild wind- cool temp.- rain night before.  Some algae bloom near shore.
Second day after 3 days of heavy rain and storms.  No boat activity- wind is light.
Fantastic fall day- summer like temperature with light west breeze.  No one on the lake.  Heavy rains of 3-4 days ago left the lake level like early June.
Public perception due to pollen.  Reading taken after overnight moderate rain.  No boat traffic over past several days.
Calm day- 2nd after 36 hours of heavy winds with wave action- leaves + needles on surface water good.
Windy with strong wave action- algae increasing daily- little rain past several days.
Lake vegetation growth seems late + slow this year. question if late (ice out) May have impact.
Vegetation growth continues to be slow. question if record + late heavy snows has increased the volume of runoff causing impact water (darker). reported information. to great "96" secchi dip.
Vegetation growth below normal for same period of past few years. visible algae-little on surface- wind calm.
Light wind-readings consistent with previous reports. question remains. why  history shows they are lower than past years. what effect does record snows + late ice out have
No rain past 10 days- overcast- little trace of algae- surface winds/ wave action.
No traffic for 3 days.  Surface is placid.  Special note - latest date recorded- what effect does the sun have
Heavy boat traffic typical for week of July 4.
Lowest level in 20 yrs.  Warm fall breeze no rain in 3 wks.
Continued dry.  Partly sunny moderate winds + waves.
Partly cloudy- heavy rains 5 days prior.  No rain in 24 hours.  No traffic- light south wind.
Light north wind.  Reading during break in clouds.  No traffic after serious boat accident on the 4th.
Last days of summer. Safety and courtesy lacking with some boaters.
Lake placid- with change in sky coming out of the Northeast.
Light boat traffic for season.  Light wave action.
DNR moving and locating new fish cribs 2 days. Built in February.
Clear- cloudless sky. Light south wind- no activity.

Sunny- mild west breeze. Rippling water. Single boat. Preceding 3 days had strong winds and sporadic heavy rains. Science teacher friend came along: Air temp - 27 C- water temp - 21.5 C- D.O. - 8.3- conductivity - 75- site depth - 15 ft.
Neighbors took reading unassisted. Partly cloudy.
Light cooling breeze. 1 boat observed. 3 loons. No rain for 10 days.
Major growth of plant like- becoming dense this year. Observed 3 boats. Water temp 78 F. Took readings with assistance from neighbor.
